## first inspection

### All

```{r}
den17 <- readRDS('../../00_data/networks/elite_den17.rda') %>% as_tibble()
```

```{r}
den17 %>% write_csv('../../00_data/networks/elite_den17.csv')
```



```{r}
den17 %>% count(ROLE, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
den17 %<>% drop_na(CVR_AFFILIATION)
```


```{r}
den17 %>% count(PERSON_ID, NAME, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
den17 %<>% add_count(PERSON_ID) %>%
  filter(n >= 2)
```
